description: Allen's new Premier line of trunk and spare tire mounted carriers deliver all of the ease of use of our patented quick-set up design, along with our new dual compound tie-down cradles to fully secure and protect your bicycles. Our new wide profile snap on feet (except on our spare tire model) help to fully distribute the load of your bicycles on your vehicle. Allen's Premier series of racks are packed full of innovative features derived of our nearly 50 years of manufacturing rear mounted bicycles. All items are backed by our exceptional customer service and our lifetime warranty.
title: Allen Sports Premier 3-Bike Spare Tire Rack
